A portal is a form of transportation that enables players to teleport between two places. Unlike ordinary teleports, portals can only be used at a fixed location and they can be used an unlimited number of times.

Contents

  • 1 Skills
    • 1.1 Agility
    • 1.2 Construction
    • 1.3 Magic
    • 1.4 Mining
    • 1.5 Runecrafting
  • 2 Minigames
  • 3 Random events
  • 4 Quests
  • 5 Other

Skills[edit | edit source]

Agility[edit | edit source]

  • The Portal found within the Prifddinas Agility Course.

Construction[edit | edit source]

  • House portals take you to a player-owned house.
  • Exit portals are the exit from a player-owned house.
  • Portal Chambers contain up to three portals with 30 possible destinations listed on the Portal Chamber page.
  • A portal nexus allows the player to store multiple teleports in a single piece of furniture. It can be built in a room also called portal nexus.

Magic[edit | edit source]

A portal in the Wizards' Guild.

There are three portals on the top floor of the Wizards' Guild.

  • The East portal sends players to the Wizards' Tower south of Draynor Village.
  • The South portal sends players to the Dark Wizards' Tower west of Falador.
  • The West portal sends players to the Sorcerer's Tower south of Seers' Village.

Mining[edit | edit source]

  • The Rune Essence mine has four exit portals.

Runecrafting[edit | edit source]

  • The Abyss contains a portal to every Runic altar.
  • The mysterious ruins are portals to the Runic altars.

Minigames[edit | edit source]

  • Saradomin, Guthix and Zamorak Portals in the Castle Wars lobby transport players to the waiting rooms of the respective teams. There are also two exit portals in the waiting rooms that allow players to leave the waiting room.
  • The Pest Control minigame features four monster portals that players aim to destroy.
  • Puro Puro can be exited through a portal in the middle of the realm.
  • Clan Wars can be exited through one of three coloured portals.
  • The Trouble Brewing minigame can be left prematurely through a portal.
  • A portal in Edgeville and Ferox Enclave takes the player to the Soul Wars lobby, with another one taking them back.

Random events[edit | edit source]

The following random events used to use portals as a way of exit.

  • Freaky Forester
  • Evil Bob's Island can be exited through a portal.

Quests[edit | edit source]

  • In Recruitment Drive, portals are used to proceed through rooms.
  • Underneath Entrana, a one-way portal takes players into level 28 of the Wilderness.
  • During The Fremennik Trials, players have to navigate through a maze of portals made by Swensen the Navigator.
  • In Recipe for Disaster, the final battle takes place behind a Portal (Recipe for Disaster).
  • During Shadow of the Storm, a portal is used to enter the demon's lair.
  • Each of the rooms in Recruitment Drive can be exited through a portal.
  • In Temple of the Eye a portal is opened by Wizard Persten, Apprentice Cordelia, Apprentice Felix, and Apprentice Tamara to the Temple of the Eye. A different larger one can take you back to the Wizard Tower basement.

Other[edit | edit source]

There are other portals scattered throughout RuneScape.

  • The Interdimensional portal on the top floor of Draynor Manor takes players to the plane where Killerwatts are.
  • The Stronghold of Security contains four portals allowing for faster travel.
  • The Evil Chicken Lair may be exited through a portal.
  • Skotizo's boss lair can be exited through a portal.

A '''portal''' is a form of [[transportation]] that enables players to [[teleport]] between two places. Unlike ordinary teleports, portals can only be used at a fixed location and they can be used an unlimited number of times.

==Skills==
===Agility===
* The [[Portal (Prifddinas Agility Course)|Portal]] found within the [[Prifddinas Agility Course]].

===Construction===
*[[POH portal|House portals]] take you to a [[player-owned house]].
*[[Exit portal]]s are the exit from a player-owned house.
*[[Portal Chamber]]s contain up to three portals with 30 possible destinations listed on the [[Portal Chamber]] page.
*A [[Portal Nexus space|portal nexus]] allows the player to store multiple teleports in a single piece of furniture. It can be built in a room also called [[portal nexus]].

===Magic===
[[File:Magic Guild portal.gif|thumb|240px|A portal in the Wizards' Guild.]]
There are three portals on the top floor of the [[Wizards' Guild]].
*The East portal sends players to the [[Wizards' Tower]] south of [[Draynor Village]].
*The South portal sends players to the [[Dark Wizards' Tower]] west of [[Falador]].
*The West portal sends players to the [[Sorcerer's Tower]] south of [[Seers' Village]].

===Mining===
*The [[Rune Essence mine]] has four exit portals.

===Runecrafting===
*The [[Abyss]] contains a portal to every [[Runic altar]].
*The [[mysterious ruins]] are portals to the Runic altars.

==Minigames==
*[[Saradomin Portal|Saradomin]], [[Guthix Portal|Guthix]] and [[Zamorak Portal]]s in the [[Castle Wars]] lobby transport players to the waiting rooms of the respective teams. There are also [[Portal (Castle Wars)|two exit portals]] in the waiting rooms that allow players to leave the waiting room.
*The [[Pest Control]] [[minigame]] features four [[Portal (Pest Control)|monster portals]] that players aim to destroy.
*[[Puro Puro]] can be exited through a [[Portal (Puro-Puro)|portal in the middle of the realm]].
*[[Clan Wars]] can be exited through one of [[Portal (Clan Wars)|three coloured portals]].
*The [[Trouble Brewing]] minigame can be left prematurely through a [[Portal (Trouble Brewing)|portal]].
*A [[Soul Wars Portal|portal]] in [[Edgeville]] and [[Ferox Enclave]] takes the player to the [[Soul Wars]] lobby, with [[Portal (Isle of Souls)|another one]] taking them back.

==Random events==
The following [[random events]] used to use portals as a way of exit.
*[[Freaky Forester]]
*[[Evil Bob's Island]] can be exited through a [[Portal (Evil Bob)|portal]].

==Quests==
*In [[Recruitment Drive]], portals are used to proceed through rooms.
*Underneath [[Entrana]], a one-way portal takes players into level 28 of the [[Wilderness]].
*During [[The Fremennik Trials]], players have to navigate through a maze of [[Portal (The Fremennik Trials)|portals]] made by [[Swensen the Navigator]].
*In [[Recipe for Disaster]], the final battle takes place behind a [[Portal (Recipe for Disaster)]].
*During [[Shadow of the Storm]], a [[Portal (Shadow of the Storm)|portal]] is used to enter the demon's lair.
*Each of the rooms in [[Recruitment Drive]] can be exited through a [[Portal (Recruitment Drive)|portal]].
*In [[Temple of the Eye]] a portal is opened by [[Wizard Persten]], [[Apprentice Cordelia]], [[Apprentice Felix]], and [[Apprentice Tamara]] to the [[Temple of the Eye (location)|Temple of the Eye]]. A different larger one can take you back to the [[Wizard Tower]] basement.

==Other==
There are other portals scattered throughout ''RuneScape''.
*The Interdimensional portal on the top floor of [[Draynor Manor]] takes players to the [[Killerwatt plane|plane]] where [[Killerwatt]]s are.
*The [[Stronghold of Security]] contains [[Portal (Stronghold of Security)|four portals]] allowing for faster travel.
*The [[Evil Chicken Lair]] may be exited through a [[Portal (Evil Chicken Lair)|portal]].
*[[Skotizo]]'s boss lair can be exited through a [[Portal (Skotizo)|portal]].
